casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Antwan ANTHONY 324A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 23, 2017 Kathryn L. VandenBerg, Attorney at Law, Jonathan E. Broun, Attorney at Law, Durham, for Anthony, Antwan. Kimberly Robb, Assistant District Attorney, Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Kimberly S. Robb, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of March 2017 by Defendant for Extension of Time to Prepare Trial Transcript:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 23rd of March 2017."

Court reporter shall have up to and including the 21st day of April 2017 to prepare and deliver transcript to counsel.
